duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for patient food service on assigned units including menu selections, tray assembly, tray delivery and pick up, stocking patients’ units where needed, and fulfilling special requests in-between meal food delivery.
Maintains accurate and current information for each patient on their assigned unit.

Takes patients menu selections prior to meal service while complying with dietary restrictions on special, modified diets to ensure optimal food preferences are met within guidelines of diet order limitations.
Communicates any patient related problems/concerns to appropriate personnel in a timely manner following departmental procedures.
Participates and attends departmental meetings and staff development programs, as appropriate.
Performs other related duties as required.
